name:
Starship
Bazaar
desc:
Trade at the Imperium-sponsored public market.

Civilian and military hardware can be bought and sold as part of a managed resale venue. A better standing with $theFaction results in higher-grade hardware being available for purchase.

Commodities are not available for sale here, and extra fees increase prices beyond standard levels. The more common Imperium blueprints are sometimes sold at a premium.
